original_text: But you say, ‘If a man tells his father or his mother, “Whatever you would have gained from me is Corban”’ (that is, given to God)—
korean_text: 너희는 이르되 사람이 아버지에게나 어머니에게나 말하기를 내가 드려 유익하게 할 것이 고르반 곧 하나님께 드림이 되었다고 하기만 하면 그만이라 하고

sentences.original_text: 'If a man tells his father or his mother,
sentences.korean_translation: '만약 어떤 사람이 그의 아버지나 어머니에게 말하기를,

sentences.original_text: "Whatever you would have gained from me is Corban"
